text: @realDonaldTrump Kind of sad that 129,000 (and counting) are dead from your response to the COVID-19 epidemic & you're devoting more attention to statues of racist, pathetic slave owners than you are to the people who have died b/c of your inability to grasp science. 🤷‍♀️#TrumpOwnsEveryDeath https://t.co/tlCCKlrGKs

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
